text:
Desimartini Disha Patani to slut-shamers: It’s hard to accept your own cheap mentality 
Disha Patani made an Instagram post where she thrashed trolls on her Instagram profile, telling her how to dress modestly. The trolls were reacting to a black outfit she wore last month to an award ceremony. bollywood Updated: Feb 24, 2017 13:30 IST ANI Disha Patani took to Instagram to teach slut-shamers a lesson.(AFP) 
Actor Disha Patani recently posted a heartfelt message on Instagram, giving a befitting reply to some of her followers who gave her moral lessons on how to dress up. 
She captioned the post, ‘Really felt a need to share this! Thanks to my fan clubs friends and family for always giving me the strength I hope we all can find this strength from within each other and stop suffering #spreadlove.’ A post shared by disha patani (paatni) (@dishapatani) on Feb 21, 2017 at 2:59am PST 
The whole incident started with her wearing a black outfit at a recent award ceremony. A post shared by disha patani (paatni) (@dishapatani) on Jan 16, 2017 at 7:22pm PST 
Recently, singer Monali Thakur, was also shamed on the Internet for wearing a short dress on the musical reality show, Rising Star. Read more
